Question.Subject: Chat Roulette Flash Problem.?
Question.Content: When I try to go on chat roulette, my browser suddenly shuts itself. I've tested IE, GC and FF. All 3 browsers don't work. My computer is definitely capable of running chat roulette. I've tryed going on without my webcam attached, no luck. So it is definitely a flash problem. Ive tryed uninstalling/reinstalling flash, but still no luck. Any ideas guys?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
You can try Opera. You can try previous versions of flash player.
And you can try to disable your antivirus, anti-malware, antispyware, firewall temporarily

Answer.Content:
You can try Opera. You can try previous versions of flash player.
And you can try to disable your antivirus, anti-malware, antispyware, firewall temporarily
